sen.e: KUSU no Iwate is a person who lived in the Asuka Period.

sen.j: 672年の壬申の乱で大友皇子（弘文天皇）ため吉備国の軍を興す使者に立ち、国守の当摩広島を殺した。
sen.e: In the Jinshin War in 672, KUSU no Iwate was chosen as a messenger to mobilize troops in the Province of Kibi for Otomo no Oji (Prince Otomo, who later became Emperor Kobun), and killed the governor of the Province TAIMA no Hiroshima.

In the Jinshin War of 672, KUSU no Iwate became an envoy responsible for mobilizing troops in the Province of Kibi for Prince Otomo (later Emperor Kobun), and killed the governor of the province, TAIMA no Hiroshima.

sen.j: 壬申の年（672年）6月下旬、天武天皇の挙兵を知った近江宮の朝廷は、各地の軍を興させるための使者を派遣した。
sen.e: When the Imperial Court learned in late June 672 that Oama no Miko (Emperor Tenmu) raised an army against it, the Court at Omi no miya dispatched messengers to the regional allies, ordering to mobilize troops.

When the Court at Omi no miya learned in late June 672 that Oama no Miko (later Emperor Tenmu) had raised an army against it, the Omi Court dispatched messengers to the regional allies to order the mobilization of troops.
sen.cmt: the Imperial Courtを具体的にthe Court at Omi no miya に変更しました。raisedの時制を変更しました。後半のthe Court at Omi no miyaをthe Omi Courtと簡略化しました。天皇名にlaterを補足しました。
sen.e: When the Court at Omi no miya learned in late June 672 that Oama no Miko (later Emperor Tenmu) had raised an army against it, the Omi Court dispatched messengers to the regional allies to order the mobilization of troops.

sen.j: このとき吉備国に遣わされたのが樟磐手で、筑紫の栗隈王には佐伯男が遣わされた。
sen.e: KUSU no Iwate was sent to the Province of Kibi, and SAEKI no Otoko was dispatched to the Province of Chikushi to deliver a message to KURIKUMA no Okimi.

sen.j: 筑紫の栗隈王と吉備の当摩広島はもと大海人皇子の配下にあった。
sen.e: Both KURIKUMA no Okimi of Chikushi Province and TAIMA no Hiroshima of Kibi Province were initially following Oama no Miko.

sen.j: 彼らも反乱に同調するのではないかと疑っていた大友皇子は、派遣の際に「もし従わない様子があったら殺せ」と樟磐手と佐伯男に命じた。
sen.e: Being skeptical that Kurikuma and Taima may join the Oama no Miko, Otomo no Oji ordered KUSU no Iwate and SAEKI no Otoko to kill both if governors show signs of disobedience.

sen.j: 吉備国に到着した磐手は、符を渡す日に広島を騙してその刀を外させてから、自分の刀を抜いて広島を殺した。
sen.e: After arriving in the Province of Kibi, Iwate deceived Hiroshima to lay down his sword on the day to hand the Imperial letter, and killed Hiroshima by his own sword.
